cluster_relations.rel_desc: Ethical guidelines are part of the means by which the potential of AI is harnessed for the benefit of all.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject (a mechanism, guideline, or practice) is used as a means to work towards achieving the object outcome or potential.

qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: Within the context of AI development and deployment
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: BenefitScope: for the benefit of all

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Promoting accountability is presented as a way to work towards harnessing the potential of AI.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject (a mechanism, guideline, or practice) is used as a means to work towards achieving the object outcome or potential.

qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: Within governance and oversight of AI technologies

args.justification: Both relations express that the subject (ethical guidelines, accountability) is a means to work towards achieving the object outcome (harnessing the potential of AI). This is primarily a goal- or purpose-oriented linkage rather than simple usage, so the broader class group should reflect PURPOSE instead of USAGE while keeping the existing canonical_rel_name and rel_cls.

executed_decisions.justification: Both relations express that the subject (ethical guidelines, accountability) is a means to work towards achieving the object outcome (harnessing the potential of AI). This is primarily a goal- or purpose-oriented linkage rather than simple usage, so the broader class group should reflect PURPOSE instead of USAGE while keeping the existing canonical_rel_name and rel_cls.
